column4: «Налог на добавленную стоимость (НДС)
column5: известный в некоторых странах как налог на товары и услуги (GST)
column7: который начисляется поэтапно. Он взимается с цены продукта или услуги на каждом этапе производства

column4: отдел с агентами, которым поручено расследовать действия людей, предприятий и других организаций. Создание департамента в то время, когда в стране существуют проблемы уклонения от уплаты налогов, увеличивает стоимость содержания департамента. The Burj Khalifa is not just the tallest building in the world—it's a towering symbol of national ambition, technological prowess, and economic aspiration. Constructing or maintaining such a megastructure represents a massive investment in prestige infrastructure, tourism, and high-end urban development. While the costs—financial, environmental, and logistical—are considerable, the benefits to global reputation, immigration appeal, and high-skill job creation can be transformative.

This creates an Argentine political loop: The government needs the money to avoid default, but increasing this tax causes massive strikes (Tractorazos") in the countryside and stifles foreign investments."
Amazon Sovereignty represents the tension between using the Amazon rainforest for economic expansion (like mining, logging, cattle) versus preserving it for international approval and climate health.

A massive terraforming project to create a new trade route through your country (similar to the Panama, Suez, or the proposed Kra Isthmus canals). It destroys local ecosystems and angers farmers whose land is seized, but once finished, it generates massive transit fees and creates a trade boom.

A massive reclaiming project (similar to the Palm Jumeirah in Dubai) to create luxury hotels, beaches, and high-end real estate. It creates a massive Tourism and GDP boom but is ecologically devastating and increases inequality (as it caters exclusively to the super-rich).
